title: Optimal AI Meal Planning Demo
content: Someone in my fitness group shared Optimal AI and we're all FREAKING OUT about what it can do! showing how Optimal AI helps with meal planning
caption: Someone in my fitness group shared Optimal AI and we're all FREAKING OUT about what it can do! #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #weight_management

scenes.text: Someone in my fitness group shared Optimal AI and we're all FREAKING OUT about what it can do!
Optimal AI makes meal planning super easy! 📱
I've never stuck with anything until {app_name} - it's just so effortless!
I had to share {app_name} because it's too good to keep secret!
